attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want to see the standard of accommodation improved drasticly within the next few years.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "improve accommodation for serving soldiers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20486


Prime Minister's Office
